translations: （在报道中）加入观点；发布社论，撰写社论（editorialize 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Yesterday the Washington Post editorialized on this subject.
sentences.translation: 昨天《华盛顿邮报》就这一主题发表了社论。

sentences.sentence: The paper editorialized that "the enormous value of such a motor to the world is almost beyond the grasp of the mortal mind."
sentences.translation: 这家报社发表社论说”这个的发电机对世界的巨大价值已经超过人类对非永生的心灵认知的价值。
